transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Ji Brijlal ji?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Brijlal ji mujhe 10 se 15 minute ka time dijiye. Main aapko video meet ka link wagera bhej ke aapse connect karti hu. Theek hai?
Customer: Achha. Theek.
Executive: Theek.
summary:
Concerns:

- Scheduling a video meeting with the customer.


Resolution:

- Customer agreed to the video meeting.
- Executive will send a link in 10-15 minutes.


Next Steps: 
Issue not resolved. Executive will send a video meet link in 10-15 minutes to connect with the customer.

Alert (If Any):
None

@@@Sentiment:
- Neutral -> Neutral

@@@Key Topics:
- video meeting, scheduling, follow-up
